full_text:
The nextgenstats loader in nflreadr was missing the Super Bowl because I am an idiot. This is fixed now. 
Running `nflreadr::.clear_cache()` followed by a call to `nflreadr::load_nextgen_stats()` will load Super Bowl data now.
